duties_responsibilities.duty: Comply with all local, state, and federal driving regulations
Train backup drivers on assigned route(s)
Fill out and distribute reporting accurately, clearly, and timely
Report issues that arise along route(s) to leadership timely (customer service, damage, maintenance, etc…)
Follow all safety regulations and company policies
Assist in warehouse tasks such as fulfillment, receiving, shipping, and replenishment
Responsible for safe operation of trucks, forklifts, and equipment
Make scheduled deliveries and pick-ups as directed by Management
Provide excellent customer service to agencies, clients, and internal customers
Maintain a high level of cleanliness in the warehouse, delivery sites and vehicles

education_certification.credential: Nevada CDL Class A with an excellent driving record
Ability to navigate using a map and GPS (knowledge of Northern Nevada a plus)
1-year experience driving a commercial box truck GVW <26,000 lb.
